name: ISO 27018 | [GRC]
description: When considering the protection of personnal health data (PPHD), the provider will be presumed compliant if it has implemented all the requirements of ISO 27018.
testingInformation: A valid certification for ISO 27018 is available.
actionPlanInstructions: Getting expert guidances from an accredited ISO 27018 professionals will help identify the gaps and provide a clear path toward the obtention of the certification.

controlMappingSources.sourceDescription: An accredited certification authority should deliver the ISO-27001 certification.
controlMappingSources.troubleshootingText: Contact your local governance risk and compliance team.
